title: SetBACnetScaleProperty (Method)
text:
METHOD SetBACnetScaleProperty
Sets the BACnet-Scale-Value of the specified Property (propID) of this BACnet-Object.
The used functions are no client, meaning, that the access of the property is not restricted by write or read access restrictions.

rows.Name: propID
rows.Comment: The ID of the property to set.

rows: The BACnet scale to set for the property.
